TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, foamyesque said:
> 
> 
> It wasn't tied to the throttle; you can see mine is set at zero. As far as I know it was completely meaningless, and I don't remember at this remove what made it light up or not.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My favourite part about picture is that you can clearly see the great big divot I had to make in order to avoid crashing into the old launch gantry ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
> 

After years of complaining about it, and years of blissfully being free of it, people are starting to mod it back.  I don't get it

Here are some of mine that get me every time. Great thread, I'd love to see it revived!

![31BDC73BC7815FAE0678EDA14AADD76424505CEE](https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/579074999601046231/31BDC73BC7815FAE0678EDA14AADD76424505CEE/)

![DD795E4BAF4A47F04A0322344A170C18BEF0AD0A](https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/922541352960230340/DD795E4BAF4A47F04A0322344A170C18BEF0AD0A/)

![1F0C64AA44B09B23CF86A9C87946403A0F7CC174](https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/797614149676303605/1F0C64AA44B09B23CF86A9C87946403A0F7CC174/)

WAIT A MINUTE I forgot the most preposterous screenshot of all! I guess when I switched out of IVA, the game continued to render Jeb's head....

![1D0D4E9ECF6615EA4E67C138D7F86C4759D4E546](https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1662355283424645426/1D0D4E9ECF6615EA4E67C138D7F86C4759D4E546/)
"Son, I am space."

My first Duna landing, circa 2014.

![phCraNg.png](https://i.imgur.com/phCraNg.png)

Though aesthetically pleasing, this is not the intended function of the boosters.

![gVZnoph.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/gVZnoph.jpg)

This is what we in the business call a “rapid unplanned disassembly”.

![pjpC1Mp.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/pjpC1Mp.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2022-01-16T23:09:33Z" title="01/16/2022 11:09  PM" data-short="2 yr">January 16, 2022</time> by Jack Joseph Kerman**

I found a few more scattered among my vast screenshot archive, some of which have appeared here and there on this forum in the past:

![ySwnp5a.png](https://i.imgur.com/ySwnp5a.png) "images captured moments before disaster"

![jFtPw2P.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/jFtPw2P.jpg) captioned this one

![QN6dWoi.png](https://i.imgur.com/QN6dWoi.png) Val stands victorious!

![sUftqCq.png](https://i.imgur.com/sUftqCq.png) Heating bug during a Jool-5 mission a while back.

![clipbo23.jpg](https://i58.servimg.com/u/f58/17/27/45/47/clipbo23.jpg) The time I went to Eve and got ganked (I imported the model file for a ship from Eve Online as a KSP part and shopped in an explosion so it's kinda fake sorta).

![screen25.jpg](https://i39.servimg.com/u/f39/17/27/45/47/screen25.jpg) There was an old "what's the biggest ship you've ever launched" thread and I had imported this ship from SpaceEngine to play around.

![screen45.jpg](https://i58.servimg.com/u/f58/17/27/45/47/screen45.jpg) A true favorite - how I used to preferentially land my planes because trying to do a rolling landing with the old wheels and the low framerate my laptop gave me just didn't feel worth it.

I went looking through old screenshots on Steam, and found this one of my first ever Mun landing. The fact that the Kerbal is overjoyed despite the engine having blown up and the useless winglets on a Mun lander get me every time.

![FdOnu40.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/FdOnu40.jpg)  

“Jack’s first ever Mun landing (2016, colorized)”

**Edited <time datetime="2022-03-04T15:17:49Z" title="03/04/2022 03:17  PM" data-short="2 yr">March 4, 2022</time> by Jack Joseph Kerman**

Things went very wrong, very quickly

![Z59AH5b.png](https://i.imgur.com/Z59AH5b.png)

Hmm....yep, definitely needs struts...

![B7aRCyJ.png](https://i.imgur.com/B7aRCyJ.png)

Jeb thinking he's definitely getting fired for this one.

![q5zAWyC.png](https://i.imgur.com/q5zAWyC.png)

During an operation to drop armored cars from rockets, parachutes were disregarded because 'what's the ground gonna do, they're structural parts!' The second mission packed parachutes.

![VYuy2A3.png](https://i.imgur.com/VYuy2A3.png)

Jeb's *definitely* getting fired for this one

![FpaPDaK.png](https://i.imgur.com/FpaPDaK.png)

The very moment Bill was possessed by the void kraken, and seconds before the only lander in the area wiggled itself to bits

![InQqAa0.png](https://i.imgur.com/InQqAa0.png)

I have quite some, so lets begin!

![Kerbal-Space-Program-Enhanced-Edition-20210225163203](https://i.ibb.co/THxNXGN/Kerbal-Space-Program-Enhanced-Edition-20210225163203.jpg)

What appears to be my first plane. Whats funny is... Look at the whole thing! Open cargo bay, some random kerbal outside, ROCKET FUEL TANKS , NO CONTROL SURFACES and so on...

![Kerbal-Space-Program-Enhanced-Edition-20210417211101](https://i.ibb.co/qnbL9X0/Kerbal-Space-Program-Enhanced-Edition-20210417211101.jpg)One of my first shuttle attempts? Idk but just take a look: Everyone's alive even in a fire! And the bunch of "canards" too.

![Kerbal-Space-Program-Enhanced-Edition-20210616102837](https://i.ibb.co/CH4c85W/Kerbal-Space-Program-Enhanced-Edition-20210616102837.jpg)

I've already talked about that

![Kerbal-Space-Program-Enhanced-Edition-20211206210240](https://i.ibb.co/5W95FY2/Kerbal-Space-Program-Enhanced-Edition-20211206210240.jpg)

THATS MY FAVOURITE. A bumpy shuttle landing. I think it was a test flight of the Phoenix shuttle. Fun fact: when something isn't perfect, I always reload dem quicksaves. But for this? Nooo, I wanted to keep it funi. And remember:

A War Thunder developer once said: "The plane is on the ground and the pilot is alive. A successful landing!"

**Edited <time datetime="2022-03-07T14:56:30Z" title="03/07/2022 02:56  PM" data-short="2 yr">March 7, 2022</time> by Aerodynamic Kerbal**

“Jack, get down from there!”

![pdcSTSh.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/pdcSTSh.jpg)

![uER7ExI.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/uER7ExI.jpg)  

I still don’t remember what I did to get the kerbal to grab onto the ladder upside down like that. (the ladder was placed the right way up)

Bill. Just Bill.

![6buMfCW.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/6buMfCW.jpg)

> 
> 
> On 3/7/2022 at 9:53 AM, Aerodynamic Kerbal said:
> 
> 
> A War Thunder developer once said: "The plane is on the ground and the pilot is alive. A successful landing!"
> 

I’ll keep that in mind when I start flying lessons this summer.

> 
> 
> On 3/7/2022 at 2:53 PM, Aerodynamic Kerbal said:
> 
> 
> "The plane is on the ground and the pilot is alive. A successful landing!"
> 

A good landing is one you can walk away from. A great landing is one where the plane can be flown again afterwards. (Probably a terrible misquote but you get the idea)

I just took this one today and I can’t stop laughing at it. Apparently getting ejected from a command seat can do some pretty weird things to a Kerbal.

![tnXqCeA.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/tnXqCeA.jpg)

I need to go back into my old modded installs and dig up some of the gems in there, but I always get a kick out of these.

This one is almost poetic with Kerbin and Mun in the background. 

![?imw=1024&imh=576&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=true](https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/822380354956019988/CC07C924364BA68C9D4625123C2BD5E76B50901F/?imw=1024&imh=576&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=true)

Second crewed mission to Eeloo (rescuing a stranded Jeb from the first mission).  Had to make some compromises to save weight, so he gets the jump seat, but he is loving it as always.

![?imw=1024&imh=576&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=true](https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/702857493966245760/368EB9F385DCFF00C7F5222CA321AFA7296E6239/?imw=1024&imh=576&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=true)

Testing out the robotic manipulator arm.

![?imw=1024&imh=576&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=true](https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/702857493976561267/6652F0AF56CC67E05175467F645F2BA121CA449D/?imw=1024&imh=576&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=true)
![S170uHA.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/S170uHA.jpg)

Yes and they're related.

How could I not mention this!

![Kerbal-Space-Program-Enhanced-Edition-20](https://i.ibb.co/R9Y2WsB/Kerbal-Space-Program-Enhanced-Edition-20220115151653.jpg)

It is from some rover tests. The antenna broke and might have knocked the kerbal out for some time!

**Edited <time datetime="2022-05-10T12:50:34Z" title="05/10/2022 12:50  PM" data-short="2 yr">May 10, 2022</time> by Aerodynamic Kerbal**

![screenshot330.png](https://i.ibb.co/j4yh8sD/screenshot330.png)

Just a normal day in KSP

**Bill got locked in the cargo bay.**

![Bill locked inside the service bay of a rover on the Mün.](https://i.imgur.com/FDPl8dk.png)

He now feels very sad and is contemplating what he did to deserve this.

**Aaaaa!!**

![Unidentified kerbal passenger is scared of flying. Especially when Jeb's the pilot](https://i.imgur.com/qWVl7C7.png)
